text: Zhang Zhen (; 5 October 1914 â€“ 3 September 2015) was a general of the People's Liberation Army of China, and a former member of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China. Zhang was born in Pingjiang County, Hunan Province. His original name was Zhang Jiansheng(), also named as Zhang Zushou(), Zhang Zhongtian(). ==Other websites== * Biography of Zhang Zhen Category:1914 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Chinese generals Category:Chinese centenarians Category:Chinese communists Category:People from Hunan Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people
title: Zhang Zhen (general)
